author: bridge-bot
content:
<dannyryan> If and how to upgrade the ceremony at future hard forks is a bit of an open question â€” can you do so in way that facilitates applications being able to upgrade trustlessly?

Two options
1. some sort of versioning inside the EVM so past and present commitments are available
2. a proof of continunity of commitment to be given to individual applications to allow them to trustlessly migrate to new commitment (h/t @CarlBeek)

Both are worth considering a bit more in the coming months because extending the ceremony is certainly valuable
